title: The Sloan and Crosby Mystery Collection - Catherine Aird
description:
Audio Books : Mystery and Suspense : Other quality : English


All sixteen titles here are unabridged. Thirteen are from CDs and three were only available from cassette tapes. All were ripped by peterg23.
Ten of these titles are recorded at 48 kbps / 44 kHz Mono CBR Fhg and the other six at 32 kbps / 22 kHz Mono CBR.
Narrators include Robin Bailey, Bruce Montague, Gordon Griffin and Ric Jerrom.



Catherine Aird (born 1930) is the pseudonym of novelist Kinn Hamilton McIntosh. She is the author of more than twenty crime fiction novels set in England and several collections of short stories.
Her witty, literate, and deftly plotted novels straddle the "cozy" and "police procedural" genres and are somewhat similar in flavor to those of Martha Grimes, Caroline Graham, M C Beaton, Margaret Yorke, and Pauline Bell.

A brief synopsis of each novel can be found at the following link: <a href="
http://www.goodreads.com/series/60320-sloan" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.goodreads.com/series/60320-sloan</a>

As far as I can tell, of the 23 titles in this series written so far, 8 have never been released in audio format.
I am unable to find the following audio titles: His Burial Too (1973), Slight Mourning (1975), Some Die Eloquent (1979),
Last Respects (1982), The Body Politic (1990), A Going Concern (1993), Injury Time (1994), After Effects (1996)
